name: Slugged
description:
This is my entry into the GMTK jam 2021.

Controls: 

A & D to move.

SPACE to jump.

R to reset.

Your job is to get the box to the ring, which signifies the goal.

There isn't any music cuz I haven't yet figured out how to make it without it sounding horrendous, so I just made some ambient sounds instead.

 There is a lot of janky things so if something doesn't work you might have to try again just in case.

Tip: if you manage to stack the slugs they will pretty much work as a singular character.

Also if you don't know what to do at the end just alt+f4
